# Breaking News Kenya | Jonathan Mwaniki

> Latest breaking news from Kenya.

## About

- [About Us - The Mwaniki Report](https://jonathanmwaniki.co.ke/about/): Our mission, our values, and the team behind The Mwaniki Report.

## Contact

- [Contact - The Mwaniki's Report](https://jonathanmwaniki.co.ke/contact/): Get in touch with The Mwaniki's Report. Share story tips, feedback, or connect with our editorial team.

- [10 Mind-Blowing Facts About Safaricom That You Didn’t Know - Jonathan Mwaniki](https://jonathanmwaniki.co.ke/posts/10-mind-blowing-facts-about-safaricom/): Safaricom isn’t just Kenya’s telco giant—its numbers, reach, and power will shock you. Here are 10 insane facts about Safaricom, from daily billions to the impact of a single cent on the whole country.

Covers all marriage types, registration processes, and African comparisons.

Can Kenya, Uganda and Tanzania fix their mess in time for AFCON 2027?

County officer Geoffrey Mosiria's expose reveals the hidden operations.

Amid church backlash, are they saviours or indecent influencers?

How Nairobi's Luthuli dealers repackage counterfeits as new and steal salary wallets.

Samuel Ngari hanged himself after app harassment. How predatory lending fuels soft life dreams and Kenya's mental health crisis.

Data shows 55% of Kenyans see it as top misinformation source amid 2024 protests.

A closer look at this troubling trend.

Here’s how this Chinese tech giant built an African empire — and why it’s a privacy nightmare.

The inside story of Nyeri's most defiant tree-hugger.

Explore the fire’s impact, the legal battle, community struggles, and ongoing debates about foreign military presence.

## Terms

- [Terms of Service - The Mwaniki Report](https://jonathanmwaniki.co.ke/terms/): Breaking news, politics, and trending stories from Kenya. The Mwaniki Report is your trusted source for truth.
